PageInfo.Message:
In Lestania there are many roaming monsters
they move in groups and attack everyone
indiscriminately.
And at night or in rain, monsters that use poison
or magic appear.
<COL ffdc78>Monsters with higher levels(Lv) are
more powerful.</COL>
Fight against enemies that match your level.

As you defeat monsters you will level up.
<COL ffdc78>You will get Experience Points(XP)
per kill.</COL>
And sometimes monsters will drop Items.
Fight monsters aggressively!
<COL ffdc78>Monsters have attributes and
weaknesses
Each monster is different as are their
weaknesses.</COL>
Know your enemy and target their weak points.
Doing so will give you an advantage.
